channel.title: New Features & Releases on
channel.description: Recent content in New Features & Releases on

item.title: SeaMeet Release History
item.description: 2/6/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Improved audio file upload experience, including progress bar display, restriction on submission before file upload, and guidance for incorrect file formats. Corrected the FAQ section explanation regarding “In-Person Meetings” on the landing page. 1/22/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Updated Google Docs meeting titles to include dates for distinguishing recurring meetings. Modified the user flow after clicking the extension. 1/16/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Enhanced audio upload experience with improved failure notifications, file analysis loading previews, and clearer error messages.
